title: The Photographers’ Gallery
subtitle:
#TPGNewTalent artist, Alice Myers is taking over the TPG Instagram this weekend - including stories and images from her project 'Nothing is Impossible Under the Sun' gathered while working with refugees and migrants in Calais.

Follow along here: https://www.instagram.com/thephotographersgallery/ …pic.twitter.com/VLEnO05pqy

title: Afghanistan & Central Asian Association
subtitle:
We are extremely proud to announce that we have been awarded the REFUGEE SUPPORT SERVICE OF THE YEAR by the London Prestige Awards! 

We're glad that our hard work providing the crucial support refugees need has been recognised  Our ongoing efforts to help will continue! pic.twitter.com/kmcA1jQQFs

title: Esther Shaylor
subtitle: As a refugee from Syria relocated to Jordan in temporary accomodation, with only your mother and no news on your father or brothers status, you start your period. What do you need to support you? Important discussions at #WWWeekpic.twitter.com/hZuRMUpZc9

title: Fatine Ezbakhe

title: Voluntary Arts
subtitle: Today we’re focusing on Musicians in Exile — a community project for asylum seeking and refugee musicians in #Glasgow. Professional facilitators help the ensemble shape their rehearsals, but what and how they play and perform is up to the musicians themselves. #EpicAwards2019pic.twitter.com/8bROnSIwKT

title: Nila Tanzil
